def_en: A particular setting is a particular place or type of surroundings where something is or takes place.

def_cn: (炉具、热水器等上可供调节的)挡，级，点，刻度
def_en: A setting is one of the positions to which the controls of a device such as a cooker, stove, or heater can be adjusted.
A table setting is the complete set of equipment that one person needs to eat a meal, including knives, forks, spoons, and glasses.
